name: Scavenger Island
description:
Scavenger Island is a game that our team created in 11 weeks. It was everyone very first game created and we all hope you enjoy all our hard work. Created by Leilani Faleafa, Cabel 'abe' Crocker, Eric Barrs, Sally Asbury, Frost Illera, Alicia Peters, Val Pullman, and Bethany Rainwater-Dove. 

 In this game you are lost on an unknown island and must collect clues to help you escape. Be quick as failure to complete it in the given time will result in death.

WASD to move. M to open the map. Mouse to look around.
